About the Company: Alpine Housing Development Corporation Ltd builds apartments for all those with an eye for detail and has responsibilities to enhance the environment, the companys policies for managing the environmental aspects across the business is priority no. one. The company`s commitment to quality Property Development encompasses Condominiums, Apartment Buildings and Commercial Complexes.They have the following business divisions : Property development , Alpine Concrete Sleepers,Alpine Alloys &Alpine Educational Foundation..The company also engagged in the business of Industry, Housing Construction.
